Recommended VS Code extensions for this project

- Python (ms-python.python) — language support, debugging, linting.
- Pylance (ms-python.vscode-pylance) — fast type checking and code intelligence.
- Remote - SSH (ms-vscode-remote.remote-ssh) — connect to Vagrant/remote VMs.
- Vagrant (hashicorp.vagrant) — helper commands for Vagrant (optional).
- GitLens (eamodio.gitlens) — enhanced git history and annotations (optional).
- Streamlit (mins.zhang.streamlit?) — community Streamlit support extensions (optional)

Install these via the Extensions pane (Ctrl+Shift+X) or from the Marketplace.
